Summon was bound to do it sooner or later.
just have to grin and baron these puns
finally Baron looks like he did in the LoL cinematic from months ago
It's almost like this might have been in development during the video production... hmmm interesting
Of course it was! These things take months to build...
Whoosh

this map over all looks simply AMAZING ,however there is a problem and  this might not bother some people but it might bother people like myself , and that is the fact that some champions or alot of champions will just look far out of place with the new map textures and the old champ textures that where designed to kind of look good with the current rift? will riot be doing a mass overall rework of older champions to help them look right again with this new upcommin texture??

This map update is part of our continuous evolution of League of Legends. It's true that some of the older champs stick out for now, but as they receive visual updates everything will come together in glorious harmony :)
So glorious harmony = dark and dull? Why are we losing the cheery rift?

I'd be willing to bet that "Dark and Dull" is intentional. If your character is bright, on a dark/dull background, it's much easier to spot them; If your bright character is on a bright background, it's hard to spot them in a teamfight.
That's the general idea! Our primary goal is to make this map support the game played on top of it. The clarity section of the blog above explains it better.
Poor {{champion:64}} wont even notice the difference

I love how Baron pit makes teemo look so much smaller now. Truly epic.
is it me or does it seem visually like dota 2? {{summoner:21}}

Wow it's only that they're revamping the old map with a nicer looking skin, using tools that previously were not available to them.
They are using similar tools NOW that Dota 2 had available when they were first designing their maps.
Think for half a second and you'd realize that similar tools make similar quality pieces.
If you don't like it, then go play Dota and stop whining.

I really like it, can´t wait to see it in action. And i really don´t understand the comparision with DOTA...sure, both have a comic-look, but so do many games. And the new Map looks a lot clearer than anything DOTA ever presented, being the WC3 ripoff it is.
I agree with your first statement, but the comparison to WC3 is stupid. League and essentially ALL MOBAs are based off WC3, including DOTA.
Actually DOTA was based of a Starcraft game mode {{item:2050}} ____ {{item:2050}}

It looks great! I can't wait to play

Wow... Riot has really given the Rift an overhaul.
Keep up the good work guys!
I like it, but not enough color

*In Summoner’s Rift today, the environment can compete visually with other game elements. In the middle of a fight, you want to be laser-focused on where Jinx is and whether or not Amumu landed his bandage toss. The environment should make that information easier for you to parse at a glance.
**So with this update to Summoner’s Rift, we’re controlling color and level of detail, clamping value ranges and reducing character occlusion** (so there are less cases where you cannot see your character) --- **all of which makes for a cleaner gameplay space where critical information pops off the screen.***
Did not think about that before. I'm looking forward to the changes
At a quick glance, I saw your name (Greasy Balls) and then "pops off the screen." I had to reread a couple of times.
Maybe bring back seasonal themes on new SR? Yes?
Or have interesting events. Like A opened hole from the void for a void theme?
